description: This file defines API routes for a 'feed' feature in a social/community application, handling operations such as listing posts, creating posts, commenting, liking, and unliking. It uses FastAPI, SQLAlchemy ORM, and references various data models and schemas.

classes.name: FeedPost
classes.description: ORM model representing a post in the feed.

classes.name: FeedPostComment
classes.description: ORM model representing a comment on a feed post.

classes.name: FeedPostLike
classes.description: ORM model representing a 'like' on a feed post.

classes.name: GroupMember
classes.description: ORM model representing membership of a user in a group.

methods.name: list[FeedPostResponse] list_feed( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), group_id=None, limit: int = 50, )
methods.description: Fetches and returns a list of feed posts, optionally filtered by group membership.

methods.name: FeedPostResponse create_post( payload: FeedPostCreateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Creates a new feed post, with optional group association after membership check.

methods.name: FeedCommentResponse comment( post_id, payload: FeedCommentCreateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Adds a comment to a specific post, increasing its comment count.

methods.name: None like(post_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Likes a post; handles idempotency and increments the like count.

methods.name: None unlike(post_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Removes a like from a post if it exists and decrements the like count.

ctags.name: comment
ctags.signature: ( post_id, payload: FeedCommentCreateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )

ctags.name: create_post
ctags.signature: ( payload: FeedPostCreateRequest, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: like
ctags.pattern: /^def like(post_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user)) -> N/
ctags.signature: (post_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))

ctags.name: list_feed
ctags.signature: ( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), group_id=None, limit: int = 50, )

ctags.name: unlike
ctags.pattern: /^def unlike(post_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user)) ->/
ctags.signature: (post_id, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user))
